verses.verse: And the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> evil<WH7451> again<WH3254> in the sight<WH5869> of the Lord<WH3068>; and the Lord<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of the Philistines<WH6430> forty<WH705> years<WH8141>.

And there was a certain<WH259> man<WH376> of Zorah<WH6881>, of the family<WH4940> of the Danites<WH1839>, whose name<WH8034> was Manoah<WH4495>; and his wife<WH802> was childless<WH6135>, and bore not<WH3205>.

And the angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> unto the woman<WH802>, and said<WH559> unto her<WH6135>, Behold now, you are childless, and carry<WH3205> not<WH2029>: but you shall conceive, and carry<WH3205> a son<WH1121>.
Now therefore beware<WH8104>, I pray you<WH8354>, and drink not wine<WH3196> nor strong drink<WH7941>, and eat<WH398> not any unclean thing<WH2931>:

For<WH2030>, behold, you shall conceive, and carry<WH3205> a son<WH1121>; and no razor<WH4177> shall come<WH5927> on his head<WH7218>: for the child<WH5288> shall be a Nazarite<WH5139> unto God<WH430> from the womb<WH990>: and he shall begin<WH2490> to deliver<WH3467> Israel<WH3478> out of the hand<WH3027> of the Philistines<WH6430>.

Then the woman<WH802> came<WH935> and told<WH559> her husband<WH376>, saying<WH559>, A man<WH376> of God<WH430> came<WH935> unto me<WH4758>, and his look was like the look<WH4758> of an angel<WH4397> of God<WH430>, very<WH3966> terrible<WH3372>: but I asked<WH7592> him not from where he was<WH5046>, neither told he me his name<WH8034>:

But he said<WH559> unto me<WH2030>, Behold, you shall conceive, and carry<WH3205> a son<WH1121>; and now drink<WH7941> no wine<WH3196> nor strong drink<WH8354>, neither eat<WH398> any unclean<WH2932> thing<WH5288>: for the child shall be a Nazarite<WH5139> to God<WH430> from the womb<WH990> to the day<WH3117> of his death<WH4194>.

Then Manoah<WH4495> entreated<WH6279> the Lord<WH3068>, and said<WH559>, O<WH994> my Lord<WH136>, let<WH4994> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> which you did send<WH7971> come again<WH935> unto us<WH3384>, and teach us what we shall do<WH6213> unto the child<WH5288> that shall be born<WH3205>.

And God<WH430> listened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of Manoah<WH4495>; and the angel<WH4397> of God<WH430> came again<WH935> unto the woman<WH802> as she sat<WH3427> in the field<WH7704>: but Manoah<WH4495> her husband was not with her<WH376>.

And the woman<WH802> made hurry<WH4116>, and ran<WH7323>, and showed<WH5046> her husband<WH376>, and said<WH559> unto him<WH376>, Behold, the man has appeared<WH7200> unto me<WH935>, that came unto me the other day<WH3117>.

And Manoah<WH4495> arose<WH6965>, and went<WH3212> after<WH310> his wife<WH802>, and came<WH935> to the man<WH376>, and said<WH559> unto him<WH376>, Are you the man that spoke<WH1696> unto the woman<WH802>? And he said<WH559>, I am.
And Manoah<WH4495> said<WH559>, Now let your words<WH1697> come to pass<WH935>. How shall we raise<WH4941> the child<WH5288>, and how shall we treat him<WH4639>?
And the angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Manoah<WH4495>, Of all that I said<WH559> unto the woman<WH802> let her beware<WH8104>.

She may not eat<WH398> of any thing that comes<WH3318> of the vine<WH1612>, neither let her drink<WH8354> wine<WH3196> or strong drink<WH7941>, nor eat<WH398> any unclean<WH2932> thing<WH6680>: all that I commanded her let her observe<WH8104>.
And Manoah<WH4495> said<WH559> unto the angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068>, I pray you<WH6113>, let us detain you<WH6213>, until we shall have made ready a kid<WH1423> for you<WH6440>.

And the angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Manoah<WH4495>, Though you detain<WH6113> me<WH398>, I will not eat of your bread<WH3899>: and if<WH518> you will offer<WH6213> a burnt offering<WH5930>, you must offer<WH5927> it unto the Lord<WH3068>. For Manoah<WH4495> knew<WH3045> not that he was an angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068>.
And Manoah<WH4495> said<WH559> unto the angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068>, What is your name<WH8034>, that when your sayings<WH1697> come to pass<WH935> we may do you honor<WH3513>?
And the angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> unto him<WH7592>, Why ask you after my name<WH8034>, seeing it is secret<WH6383>?

So Manoah<WH4495> took<WH3947> a kid<WH1423> with a food offering<WH4503>, and offered<WH5927> it upon a rock<WH6697> unto the Lord<WH3068>: and the angel did<WH6213> wondrously<WH6381>; and Manoah<WH4495> and his wife<WH802> looked on<WH7200>.

For it came to pass<WH3851>, when the flame went up<WH5927> toward heaven<WH8064> from off the altar<WH4196>, that the angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068> ascended<WH5927> in the flame<WH3851> of the altar<WH4196>. And Manoah<WH4495> and his wife<WH802> looked on<WH7200> it<WH5307>, and fell on their faces<WH6440> to the ground<WH776>.

But the angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068> did no more<WH3254> appear<WH7200> to Manoah<WH4495> and to his wife<WH802>. Then Manoah<WH4495> knew<WH3045> that he was an angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068>.
And Manoah<WH4495> said<WH559> unto his wife<WH802>, We shall surely<WH4191> die<WH4191>, because we have seen<WH7200> God<WH430>.

But his wife<WH802> said<WH559> unto him<WH3863>, If the Lord<WH3068> were pleased<WH2654> to kill<WH4191> us<WH3947>, he would not have received a burnt offering<WH5930> and a food offering<WH4503> at our hands<WH3027>, neither would he have showed<WH7200> us all these things<WH6256>, nor would as at this time have told<WH8085> us such things as these<WH2063>.
And the woman<WH802> bore<WH3205> a son<WH1121>, and called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Samson<WH8123>: and the child<WH5288> grew<WH1431>, and the Lord<WH3068> blessed him<WH1288>.
And the Spirit<WH7307> of the Lord<WH3068> began<WH2490> to move him at times<WH6470> in the camp<WH4264> of Dan<WH1835> between Zorah<WH6881> and Eshtaol<WH847>.
